additional_notes: He was a soldier in the service of Leone Strozzi
He was an agent of Filippo Strozzi, but he was imprisoned in Florence. Then he was released by the Duke Cosimo I and became an agent of the Medici family
Son of Pierantonio Bandini and brother of Mario Bandini. Colonel in the French army.

pseudonym: Barbigi Bernardo o Del Barbigia Bernardo
Barbigi Domenico o Del Barbigia Domenico

additional_notes: Her maiden name was Marie Catherine de Pierrevive (Piedmontese). Wife of Guidobaldo or Antonio Gondi and nurse of Catherine de' Medici.
Albizzo Del Bene's wife and business woman.
He had business in Lyon in company with his brother Giovanni Francesco Bini.

full_name: Gondi Guidobaldo di Leonardo detto Antonio

additional_notes: He was considered the richest banker of Lyon, as the saying goes: "riche comme Gadagne".
He had business in Lyon in company with his brother Piero Bini and the Strozzi family.
He killed the Duke Alessandro de' Medici.
